reviewText:
I'm only giving it 4 stars because I was under the impression that it was going to be dubbed and subbed.... make sure you tell your customers it's only subbed ... other then that I fine it is awesome

Edit: no no no... the subbing on this is crap.... sometimes there's not sub to read so you miss important parts, or it's in kanji, the sub time is slow ...it's fine because I've watched this already... but what if someone new bought it and was watching it for the first time?
This is my favorite anime! Such great condition!
Subtitles are inconsistent and sometimes crappy.
